text_to_speech: Prosím, na uloženie batožiny použite regále
text_to_speech_en: Please, use the shelves to store the luggage
Please take extra care while getting off

text_to_speech: Konečná zastávka, prosím vystúpte. Ďakujeme, že s dopravným podnikom Bratislava cestujete ekologicky.
text_to_speech_en: Final stop, please exit. Thank you for using (???) friendly public transport
